thread.title: Troian Bellisario shared her first Valentine’s Day gift as a married woman, and we’re feeling it
thread.title_full: Troian Bellisario shared her first Valentine’s Day gift as a married woman, and we’re feeling it

author: Shaunna Murphy
title: Troian Bellisario shared her first Valentine’s Day gift as a married woman, and we’re feeling it
text:
Troian Bellisario shared her first Valentine’s Day gift as a married woman, and we’re feeling it Given that their boho-chic, campground California wedding was just about the most romantic thing to happen to any of our lives in 2k16, we were fully expecting newlyweds Troian Bellisario and Patrick J. Adams to have the most hashtag goals first Valentine’s Day as a married couple ever.
And they did! Sort of. Kind of. Let us explain.
Bellisario has been in Brazil for the past few days taking in the sites — and taking some amazing photos — with her Pretty Little Liars costar Ian Harding and her best friend, Lulu Brud. Adams, meanwhile, is stuck back home, likely filming Suits in Toronto. Sigh .
But lest anyone accuse him of being a neglectful Valentine, Adams made sure to send roses and mimosas to Bellisario’s Rio De Janiero hotel first thing in the morning.
A valentine from a world away. I'm ready to come home now please. 
A post shared by Troian Bellisario (@sleepinthegardn) on Feb 14, 2017 at 4:20am PST 
A Valentine’s Day with no date pressure, mimosas in bed, gorgeous roses, two best friends, and the beaches of Rio right outside your doorstep?!
Yep, Bellisario wins. Again.
The Girl from Ipanema goes walking. (Guys I had to do it) 
A post shared by Troian Bellisario (@sleepinthegardn) on Feb 14, 2017 at 7:34am PST 
Of course we hope that the couple finds time to celebrate together once they’re both back in Los Angeles, but for now, we just love that they’re able to take care of each other whilst also living their best lives separately. That’s what true romance is all about.
